segments.text: The girl standing next to the boy seems so excited, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, ready to receive her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cute to see her anticipation, but I can't help but worry about her safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the unstable stool or the potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes the risk involved in what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit disappointing to see her not being more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to tell her to be more cautious and aware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know she's just a child, and children can be careless sometimes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she learns to be more careful in the future.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: For now, I just watch and hope that everything turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR
